name: McDermott Will & Emery LLP and its affiliates
goal:
With 20+ locations across the US, Europe and Asia, McDermott Will & Emery works seamlessly across practices, industries and geographies to deliver highly effective—and often unexpected—solutions that propel success. More than 1,100 lawyers strong, we bring our personal passion and legal prowess to bear in every matter for our clients and the people they serve.

Our capabilities are comprehensive, offering distinct, but connected services covering investigations, election and political law, contracts and procurement, lobbying, and legislative matters. Unlike many lobbying firms, our team includes practicing lawyers, which gives clients the added value of knowing that, by working with a law firm, all interactions are protected by the attorney-client privilege.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Fraud prevention, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Initiatives, policies, and legislation relating to privacy and cybersecurity, healthcare, anti-trust, telecommunications and tax.
